meanings.definition: A breed of Hungarian sheepdog with a long, corded coat.
meanings.sent1: The puli herded the sheep with its long, shaggy coat.
meanings.sent2: I saw a puli at the dog park today.
meanings.sent3: The puli's coat was so long, it looked like a mop!
meanings.sent4: The puli's corded coat resembled a tangle of vines.
meanings.sent5: The puli's unique coat made it stand out among other dogs.

meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for puli when I visited India.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper accepted puli as payment for the goods.
meanings.sent3: I found a forgotten puli in my pocket and felt rich!
meanings.sent4: To him, money was just pieces of puli paper.
meanings.sent5: The shiny puli coins jingled in his pocket as he walked.
